Text:
function EP03_29()
    --.結-4【9月第4週】「戦姫と姫巫女」
    SaveData.Title = "戦姫と姫巫女"

    --//BG：大講堂（正面）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG024aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(210,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(210, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(211,0,-2)
    SET_CUTIN_03_L(100, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Everyone at the venue~~~~! Are you pumped up~~~~~!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(250, 20, -215, 150, 500, false, true)

    --//SE：歓声（MAX)
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    RESET_CUTIN_03_RIGHT(100, 500)

    --//BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Tehehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Thank you so much for that amazing response!! My heart is totally fluttering～～<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Today we have the Princess Election later, so this will be the last song! But instead of just warming up the venue, let's heat it up to the point of meltdownーーーーーー!" ]])
    --//SE：歓声（MAX)
--PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Then, for the finale, of course we’ll go with this song! ‘Boku ⇒ ‘Hime’ A, B, C’!" ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)
STOP_BGM(1000)
    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//effect：以下、OPをバックで流しつつ進行
PLAY_BGM("BGM99_Inst.wav",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0867.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "...Amazing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0868.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "That’s what moves a top idol makes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While Hermes-san’s singing and the cheers echoed through the auditorium, I quietly made my way along the edge of the audience, heading backstage where the candidates for the Princess Election were waiting. ]])

    MSG([[ So as not to attract attention. But though I had to hurry, my eyes kept drifting to Hermione-san standing on stage. ]])

    MSG([[ Singing passionately while dancing intensely. ]])

    MSG([[ Despite likely being quite fatigued, she never lost her smile, waving to the audience whenever she had a chance, making eye contact, even calling out to them. ]])

    MSG([[ Her earnest desire to meet everyone’s expectations hit me deeply, making my heart tremble. ]])

    MSG([[ That is the top of this academy. The academy’s finest ‘Hime.’_r Feeling the gap between myself and Hermes-san, a strange, unfamiliar emotion spread deep within my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ I placed my hand over my heart, sensed the true nature of the feeling, and was stunned at myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0869.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 (…I see. I’m frustrated by the difference between me and Hermes-san.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0870.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 (There’s no way a cross-dressing guy can beat a real idol… What an idiot I am.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Oh my. Erika-san, were you also captivated by Lady Hermes?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0871.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Uran-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran-san passed by and stood beside me as I watched Hermes-san on stage. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Lady Hermes is truly a mysterious person. Not only is she outstanding in looks and ability, flourishing in the entertainment world, but she is also pure and innocent like a child." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "As one who bears the same title of ‘Hime,’ feelings of admiration and jealousy mix deep within one’s chest, don’t they?" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san narrowed her eyes as if speaking right into the depths of my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ It was surprising to think she harbored any jealousy toward Hermes-san. ]])

    MSG([[ At a loss for words, I listened as Uran-san continued while gazing at the stage. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Until now, I have always endeavored to be a lady." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0225.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Avoiding speaking of jealousy and steering clear of conflicts with others. Surely to those around me, I appeared the very picture of a Yamato Nadeshiko." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0226.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "But even I get jealous. I get angry at those whose views differ, and at times I don’t hesitate to confront them." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0227.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "I believe that’s a far healthier relationship than one based on mere formal friendship." ]])

    MSG([[ Her words brought to mind the days I had spent with Uran-san over these past few months. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//CG：お茶会
FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)
    --//effect：セピア


    MSG([[ From the moment we met, she had been quite friendly toward me. ]])

    MSG([[ In hindsight, perhaps because I was related to Marika-neesan, she wished to recruit me to the conservative faction. ]])

    MSG([[ Indeed, since the dispute with the boys’ division, opportunities to interact have decreased. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, strangely, I feel closer to her now than before. ]])

    MSG([[ Though there was conflict, we are still friends, and that hasn’t changed. Yes, I can say that with certainty. ]])

FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

    --//BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    --//BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0872.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Uran-san. Today, I will show you that I can win." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0873.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "As a fellow ‘Hime.’ And more than anything, as a friend, let’s compete fairly and squarely! Princess Priestess Uran Ryuguuin!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//CI：エリカのBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 039
    SET_CUTIN_04_M(210, 300,true)
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERI01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,60)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


PLAY_VOICE("uran_0228.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "I accept your challenge. Battle Princess Erika Ikusa." ]])

    --//CI：ウランのBU（笑顔）目元切り抜き 072
    SET_CUTIN_05_M(-20, 300,true)
    LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(211,0,-260)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Together, we proceeded backstage. To begin the decisive battle that will decide the fate of the boys’ division, myself, and the future of Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    RESET_CUTIN_00()
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_30")
end
